name: RadSquad - University Project
description:
RadSquad is a project developed with two other classmates for the third semester of our Game Development course.

The third semester brief required a companion app to be developed along with the game, hence the IP request in the title screen, but this can be ignored.

RadSquad was made with games like Celeste and Speedrunners in mind, and is heavily focused on fast 2D movement and completing levels as quickly as possible.
